title: Organ donation rate in the United Kingdom 2018/19 , by country
yAxis: Rate of donation per million population
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Rate of donation per million population for 4 number of Countrys.
The Rate of donation per million population is highest at Country Wales and lowest at Country Scotland.
The minimum Country Scotland has got 1.72 times less Rate of donation per million population than the maximum Country Wales.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Rate of donation per million population in each Country on the y axis.
Country Wales has the highest Rate of donation per million population and Scotland has the lowest Rate of donation per million population.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Rate of donation per million population for 4 number of Countrys.
The Rate of donation per million population is highest at Country Wales and lowest at Country Scotland.

The average Rate of donation per million population in all 4 Countrys is 24.03.
